html:
12.19.23  1:03 am   do you have any thoughts about your song "got to know what's going on"

      sure. at first, only that one line was written (the line that has the title in it) and it stayed that way for about 7 years. it's about this feeling where you feel like nobody knows quite what's going on in the world, but everyone really wishes they did. a worldwide desire to achieve clarity about how everything really works, in general. anyway, when i finally ended up writing the song, i followed my standard professional songwriting practices, in support of the original seed as described above. it was written and recorded on a very tight schedule (1 week), which has its advantages and disadvantages

12.19.23  12:09 am   but what if?

      then; else

12.18.23  11:18 pm   how can i stay afloat

      you'll need to hollow out your inside, while keeping your exterior tightly sealed. that's just buoyodynamics

12.18.23  11:16 pm   I have a question

      oh, i'm taken aback

12.18.23  11:08 pm   Is improvising actually just really fast composing?

      yes

12.18.23  11:02 pm   Can I eat a black hole?

      no, but it can eat you. i realize this may seem unfortunate

12.18.23  11:02 pm   What u do

      hm, i'll think of something

12.18.23  10:39 pm   where can i put it down?

      right over there

12.18.23  10:30 pm   what's that feeling when you're doing everything right but everything goes wrong

      Comedy

12.18.23  8:56 pm   What is your iq?

     it's off the charts, but i'm not sure which side

     You seem like a very intelligent person.

      that's probably just because i know which way is latitude and which way is longitude

12.18.23  8:41 pm   hi. i am typing this on a flip phone. thoughts?

      reading that, indeed makes me think about your flip phone

12.18.23  8:38 pm   what do you think people expect from a response to the question "who are you"

      maybe they want to know why you're here

12.18.23  8:12 pm   I want to learn four skills and two topics, but how do I balance my schedule to avoid favoring one over the other?

      just divide it up evenly

12.18.23  7:46 pm   I have a lot of things I need to do, but I always seem to do one thing so slowly that I don't have time to do anything else. Mostly my homework, it's like my brain is working at most at 50% capacity. I know that I'm able to do it at normal speed, but I just don't, and that results in not only everything else not getting done, but I can also never get good sleep for sustained periods because the few things I *have* to get done take a long time, and then I am just tired the next day. Any suggestions?

      sympathy yes, suggestions no

12.18.23  7:36 pm   what is your least favorite genre of music

      i hate them all, i just love the music

12.18.23  7:02 pm   i ran out of chords and needs some new replacements, got any suggestions?

      i'm sure i would if you actually told me what needs replacing

12.18.23  5:14 pm   what color was the dress--black and blue or white and gold?

      in real life it was blue and black. the photo, however, was more ambiguous, due to lighting, combined with varying brightness settings

12.18.23  4:55 pm   I just watched "the ending" and I'm unclear on whether there's anything you think is true

      maybe it stems back to a lack of clarity on what is considered a thing

12.18.23  4:39 pm   How are you so blatantly funny?

      sometimes it can be as simple as telling the truth at different times from when it's expected

12.18.23  3:59 pm   Do you have perfect pitch?

      my sense of musical (relational) pitch has a tendency to strongly override the sense of absolute (non-musical) pitch, however, if necessary i am able to accurately find absolute (non-musical) pitch at any time with no reference on hand

12.18.23  3:50 pm   Since you're the creator of your own music, do you like listening to it?

      only if i'm in an extremely self confident mood

12.18.23  3:44 pm   do you have any plans to share with the world- the recording and technical side of what you do?

      yes

12.18.23  3:03 pm   If everything is always changing, including you, what even makes you you?

      what makes me me is me and what makes you you is you. nothing else will do

12.18.23  2:51 pm   have you ever found that when you're going for humor it often doesn't land but sometimes the things you say without even thinking about it make some people laugh inexplicably

      i've been aware of this paradoxical nature of humor for as long as i can remember. so i find it important to never be quite sure whether you are 'going for humor'

12.18.23  2:41 pm   In your song "I can play", how do you know the cows won't come home?

      i don't. that's the cool thing about songwriting. you can play "what if"

12.18.23  2:28 pm   What is the point of it all

      there's much more than 1 point. i'm assuming you were thinking there is only one, because of the way you used the word 'the' there

12.18.23  1:49 pm   Is success luck?

     no, but luck may play a role in success depending on the time frame. in shorter time frames, luck playes a stronger role. in longer time frames, luck matters less and less

     I tried everything within my means this past 2 years to be an artist on internet but still no single follower there is some like and comments tho

     if you keep doing what you are passionate about for long enough, you will be fine

12.18.23  1:36 pm   are planes birds

      no

12.18.23  12:42 pm   would you say you make content for yourself, or do you make content for others?

      both

12.18.23  12:07 pm   I've been trying to write lyrics and then putting music to said lyrics. Is this a bad strategy?

     i have no idea, but it doesn't work for me

      Should I instead write a melody first to then add lyrics to?

     that also is usually not the way i do it. for me, it's usually best for 'music' and 'words' to be as tightly bonded as the red and blue elements of the purple font you see on this page. it actually never even occured to me to try keeping them separate. but it doesn't mean you can't

12.18.23  10:42 am   What do you think of the oboe?

      i usually don't like the way it sounds, but that doesn't mean it's not good

12.18.23  10:41 am   What's your favorite type of cactus?

      how about the residential garden cactus, common in Arizona

12.18.23  10:05 am   Should I continue doing something I'm not very good at

      maybe sometimes

12.18.23  10:05 am   would you have a nicer day, if someone said "have a nice day"?

      no. "have a nice day" actually means "goodbye, you and i don't care about each other"

12.18.23  9:30 am   How long is never?

      0

12.18.23  9:21 am   whats your routine

      put one foot in front of the other

12.18.23  9:11 am   Do you notice trends in these questions as the seasons transform?

     sure

      I.e. more problems/brain fog in Winter, etc?

     never noticed that one

12.18.23  7:53 am   What happens when a doctor eats an apple?

     i don't know any other way of explaining it other than the phrasing you already used just there

     Does their medical license get revoked? Do they disappear?

     no

12.18.23  7:45 am   do you think a cat would be a good mayor

      no

12.18.23  4:05 am   What to do on an airplane!?

      in most cases, just sit still for a long time

12.18.23  3:20 am   hi I miss you, I feel like you're my friend and I hope that you are doing well! Do you need the socks to be matching? Or will you wear a mismatched sock combination? 

     it's somewhat important for them to feel the same, but i have no concern about them looking the same

12.18.23  2:13 am   When is tomorrow?

      less than 24 hours in the future

12.18.23  1:12 am   Do you feel bad when doing something you know your past self would disapprove of?

      not necessarily

12.18.23  12:46 am   what sounds really cool right now?

     clink

     what do you think might sound really cool later?

      clank

12.18.23  12:45 am   If I were to write a message for myself to read 30 days in the future, what are the main themes I should explore

      how things are now, how you think things might be in 30 days, and, also how things were 30 days ago

12.18.23  12:09 am   About how much of the time are you a huge gamer these days?

      i have a gamer costume. that's about it

12.17.23  11:33 pm   how to do a good job?

      be the job. "i am job", you tell yourself

12.17.23  11:21 pm   What's the most important thing?

      sometimes we feel like we know

12.17.23  10:27 pm   do you ever think blank? you are thinking but like you aren't thinking about anything at the same time. you kinda just zoom out.

      might put that more in the 'feeling' category

12.17.23  9:55 pm   is your next song about an adventure

      most of my songs are about adventures
